data.eml:eml: Genus Panthous Stål found from Cambodia, Thailand, and Vietnam, with the redescription of Panthous ruber Hsiao

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Truong, Xuan Lam, Zhao, Ping, Cai, Wanzhi (2006): Genus Panthous Stål found from Cambodia, Thailand, and Vietnam, with the redescription of Panthous ruber Hsiao. Zootaxa 1294: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173521
